top_level_symbols.name: equal_power_crossfade
top_level_symbols.doc:
Join two mono signals with an equal-power crossfade. Args:
    a: First signal ``[-1, 1]``.

top_level_symbols.name: micro_fade
top_level_symbols.doc:
Apply short linear fades to the beginning and end of ``signal``. Args:
    signal: Mono signal ``[-1, 1]``.
